step1.title: Discover Amazing Events
step1.text: Browse through our curated collection of events happening across Egypt. From concerts and festivals to workshops and cultural events, find the perfect experience that matches your interests. Use our advanced filters to search by category, location, date, or price range.

step2.title: Secure Your Tickets
step2.text: Select your preferred event and choose from different ticket tiers (Regular, Gold, Platinum). Our secure payment system accepts all major credit cards and ensures your financial information is protected. Complete your booking and receive instant confirmation with your ticket details.

step3.title: Get Your NFC Card
step3.text: For your first purchase, visit any of our authorized merchants to collect your NFC access card. This contactless card provides faster entry to events and works at all supported venues. Don't forget to bring your booking confirmation and a valid ID.

step4.title: Enjoy the Experience
step4.text: Arrive at your event with your NFC card or digital ticket QR code. Our streamlined entry process gets you inside quickly so you can focus on enjoying the experience. Share your memories and discover your next adventure!

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.text: By accessing and using Ticket Runners' platform, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. These terms apply to all users of the platform, including event organizers, attendees, and visitors.

section2.title: User Accounts and Registration
section2.text: You must create an account to book tickets. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating your account. You must be at least 18 years old to create an account, or have parental consent if under 18.

section3.title: Ticket Booking and Payment
section3.text: All ticket purchases are final and non-refundable unless otherwise stated in our refund policy. Prices are subject to change without notice. Payment must be made in full at the time of booking. We accept major credit cards and other payment methods as indicated on our platform. All transactions are processed securely through our payment partners.

section4.title: Event Attendance and Conduct
section4.text: You must comply with all venue rules and regulations when attending events. Event organizers reserve the right to deny entry or remove attendees who violate venue policies or engage in disruptive behavior. You are responsible for your own safety and the safety of any dependents accompanying you.

section5.title: NFC Card Usage
section5.text: NFC cards are issued for your personal use and are non-transferable. You are responsible for the security of your NFC card and must report any loss or theft immediately. Replacement cards may incur additional fees. The NFC card remains the property of Ticket Runners and must be returned upon request.

section6.title: Intellectual Property
section6.text: All content on our platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by Ticket Runners or our licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written consent.

section7.title: Limitation of Liability
section7.text: Ticket Runners is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our platform or attendance at events. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the specific ticket giving rise to the claim.

section8.title: Modifications to Terms
section8.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our platform. Your continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. We will notify users of significant changes via email.

data_collection.title: Information We Collect
data_collection.text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, book tickets, or contact our support team. This includes your name, email address, phone number, payment information, and event preferences. We also collect information about your device and how you use our platform to improve your experience.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.text: We use your information to process your ticket bookings, send you confirmations and updates about events, provide customer support, and improve our services. We may also use your information to send you personalized recommendations for events that match your interests, with your consent.

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with event organizers to facilitate your attendance, with payment processors to complete transactions, and with service providers who help us operate our platform. We may also disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights and safety.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. This includes encryption of sensitive data, secure payment processing, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how you use our platform. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect some features of our website.

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of marketing communications at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@ticketrunners.com. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
eligibility.text: Refunds are available in the following circumstances: Event cancellation by the organizer, event postponement where you cannot attend the new date, significant changes to event details that affect your ability to attend, or technical issues on our platform that prevent successful booking. Refund eligibility is determined on a case-by-case basis.

process.title: How to Request a Refund
process.text: To request a refund, contact our customer support team at support@ticketrunners.com or call +20 122 652 1747. Include your booking reference number, the reason for your refund request, and any supporting documentation. We will review your request and respond within 3-5 business days. Approved refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days to your original payment method.

exceptions.title: Non-Refundable Situations
exceptions.text: Refunds are not available for: Change of mind or personal circumstances, failure to attend the event without prior notice, minor changes to event details (time, venue within same city), or if the event proceeds as scheduled. Additionally, service fees and NFC card costs are non-refundable once the card has been issued.

partial_refunds.title: Partial Refunds
partial_refunds.text: In some cases, partial refunds may be offered. This could include situations where only part of a multi-day event is cancelled, or when alternative arrangements are made that reduce the event's value. The amount of partial refund will be determined based on the specific circumstances.

transfer_fees.title: Transfer Fees
transfer_fees.text: If you transfer your ticket to another person, the 50 EGP transfer fee is non-refundable. This fee covers the administrative costs of processing the transfer and updating our systems.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about our refund policy or need to request a refund, please contact our customer support team. We're here to help ensure you have a positive experience with Ticket Runners.

q1.question: How do I book a ticket?
q1.answer: Booking a ticket is simple! Browse our events, select your preferred event, choose your ticket type and quantity, fill in your details, and complete the payment. You'll receive a confirmation email with your ticket details.

q2.question: Can I refund my ticket?
q2.answer: Refund policies vary by event organizer. Generally, tickets are non-refundable unless the event is cancelled or rescheduled. Please check the specific refund policy for each event before booking.

q3.question: Is my payment secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard SSL encryption and secure payment gateways to protect your financial information. All transactions are processed through trusted payment providers.

q4.question: What is an NFC card and why do I need it?
q4.answer: An NFC (Near Field Communication) card is a contactless access card that allows you to enter events quickly and securely. It's required for your first purchase and provides faster entry compared to QR codes.

q5.question: How do I get my NFC card?
q5.answer: After your first purchase, visit any of our authorized merchants to collect your NFC card. Bring your booking confirmation and a valid ID. The card will be activated and ready to use immediately.

q6.question: Can I transfer my tickets to someone else?
q6.answer: Yes, you can transfer tickets to another person. There's a small transfer fee of 50 EGP per ticket. You'll need the recipient's email address to complete the transfer.

q7.question: What happens if an event is cancelled?
q7.answer: If an event is cancelled, you'll be automatically refunded the full ticket price. You'll receive an email notification and the refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.

q8.question: Can I book tickets for multiple people?
q8.answer: Yes! You can book multiple tickets in a single transaction. For dependents (children, family members), you'll need to provide their email addresses so they can receive their individual tickets.

q9.question: What should I do if I lose my NFC card?
q9.answer: If you lose your NFC card, contact our support team immediately. You can still access events using the QR code in your digital ticket, but you'll need to purchase a new NFC card for future events.

q10.question: How do I contact customer support?
q10.answer: You can reach our customer support team at support@ticketrunners.com or call us at +20 122 652 1747. We're available 24/7 to help with any questions or issues.
